Erasmus Blog

My internship abroad in Estonia

Introduction

Dear readers,

Welcome to my blog, which is being written on the occasion of my internship in the Estonian capital, Tallinn.
Over the next 2 months, from June 25th to August 25th, I will take you on this journey and present to you, as best as I can, the cultural and recreational wonders of the country, as well as my work-related activities.

Estonia, a small country in northern Europe, has captivated me from the very beginning with its architectural and natural beauty, its rich history, and its integrated IT sector into the social life of everyday citizens.

I look forward to engaging, entertaining, and perhaps even inspiring you to explore Tallinn, Estonia, and the rest of the world for yourselves.
Join me on this exciting journey, and let us discover together the wonders and beauty of this country!
